title: Chapter 2025 - Chapter 2025: Chapter 2024-Throw Out
body:
Chapter 2025 - Chapter 2025: Chapter 2024-Throw Out

Chapter 2025: Chapter 2024-throw out

Translator: 549690339

In the blink of an eye, ten days had passed.

For the past ten days, Lu Ming had been cultivating in peace in the Grand princess’s residence.

&Nbsp; his chaos laws had reached 97% and his array Dao laws had reached 99%.

It could be said that he was already very close to perfection. However, the closer he was to perfection, the harder it would be to improve.

Many people’s nomological laws stopped at ninety-nine percent maturity for hundreds, thousands, and even tens of thousands of years.

Even the stellar River had stopped for a long time.

If he wanted to break through, he needed to accumulate experience. When his comprehension of the laws was sufficient, it would naturally come to fruition.

On this day, Lu Ming was cultivating when Ji Peng brought a few people into the Grand princess’s residence with a gloomy expression. They were walking towards Lu Ming’s residence.

Ji Peng’s status was no small matter, so naturally, no one stopped him.

When they arrived at Lu Ming’s residence, Ji Peng kicked the door open and walked in with a dark expression.

“Lu Ming, get out here!”

Ji Peng coldly shouted.

In the room, Lu Ming, who was cultivating, opened his eyes. There was a sharp glint in his eyes.

Unhurriedly, Lu Ming walked out of the room and saw Ji Peng looking at him coldly.

More than ten days ago, Lu Ming had sent him flying with a palm strike in public, causing him to Twitch on the ground and lose face. During this period of time, he had been brooding over it and wanted to find a chance to take revenge.

Later on, when he heard that Lu Ming had become the eldest princess’s guest elder, he was even more furious. After holding it in for a few days, he finally could not help but bring Lu Ming here.

brat, 1 know what you’re trying to do. You want to become the princess’s guest elder and get close to her. You’ve got a good plan. Now, I’ll give you a chance to get out of the princess’s Manor!

Ji Peng coldly spoke.

“The eldest Princess sent you here?”

Lu Ming said.

“There’s no need for the eldest Princess to instruct us on this matter!” Ji Peng said.

“I’m the eldest princess’s foreign dignitary, not yours. Since the eldest Princess didn’t say anything, then Who Do You Think You Are? what right do you have to make me leave?”

Lu Ming replied indifferently.

These words made Ji Peng’s face even gloomier.

“Brat, you’d better get out by yourself. Otherwise, I’ll break your four limbs and throw you out!”

Ji Peng said coldly.

“Get lost!”

Lu Ming spat out the word coldly. He had already lost his patience.

“Brat, what’s with your attitude? how dare you talk to the second young master like that? I’ll cripple you!”

A burly man beside Ji Peng rushed over and threw a punch at Lu Ming’s dantian.

This was to cripple Lu Ming’s cultivation!

This brawny man was in the great circle of the absolute Saint realm. He punched out, and the terrifying fist force made the space howl.

Zzzzzzz…

Lu Ming circulated the chaos law and transformed it into the demonic lightning law. Lightning swam around his body as if he was wearing a lightning armor.

Whoosh!

Lu Ming’s figure moved and he threw a punch at the burly man.

Zzzzzzz…

The lightning spread and instantly destroyed the opponent’s attack. The black Lightning covered the opponent’s body, causing him to tremble and retreat.

Then, Lu Ming took a step forward and slapped the burly man. The burly man flew backward and fell to the ground, his body twitching non-stop.

Ji Peng and the others ‘eyes suddenly narrowed.

Lu Ming’s combat strength was stronger than they had imagined. A perfected absolute Saint had been defeated in two moves. Even Ji Peng might not be able to do it himself.

“Let’s attack together!”

Ji Peng let out a furious roar. His body was like a ROC spreading its wings as he flew towards Lu Ming. With a shake of his arms, his arms emitted a mysterious light. They were like the wings of a ROC, but also like two heavenly blades. Two rays of light burst out and shot towards Lu Ming.

This was his divine power Technique. When he exchanged blows with Lu Ming previously, he did not use his divine power Technique.

At the same time, the remaining two people also moved.

The two of them were also in the great circle of the absolute Saint realm. They used their divine abilities to attack Lu Ming.

He was ruthless and merciless. If Lu Ming was no match for him, he would be killed.

“You’re pushing it!”

The cold glint in Lu Ming’s eyes intensified. He condensed a long spear in his hand, which was covered with a layer of Black Lightning.

Whoosh! Whoosh! Whoosh!

He stabbed three times in a row!

There were three consecutive explosions. The attacks of Ji Peng and the other two were all blocked by Lu Ming.

Then, Lu Ming seemed to have transformed into a bolt of lightning. In a flash, he appeared in front of an elder in the absolute saint’s perfection. The lightning Spear stabbed out at an astonishing speed. It pierced the elder’s dantian and shattered his Saint heart.

The man wailed in pain as his body flew out and fell to the ground, screaming in pain.

This person’s cultivation had already been crippled by Lu Ming.

Then, Lu Ming moved again and appeared in front of the remaining absolute Saint. He thrust his spear again and crippled his cultivation.

After two people were crippled in a row, Ji Peng was so scared that his liver and guts were torn apart. He quickly retreated, wanting to escape, but he didn’t dare to fight.

However, with a flash of lightning, Lu Ming caught up to Ji Peng.

Although Lu Ming had transformed the chaos law into the demonic lightning law, its power had been greatly reduced.

However, Lu Ming’s spirit body and his Saint energy were far above Ji Peng’S. Ji Peng was not his match at all.

Although he tried his best, he was still crushed by Lu Ming.

Kachaa!

Lu Ming broke one of Ji Peng’s arms with a palm strike and then broke one of his legs with a kick.

Kachaa! Kachaa!

After a few consecutive explosions, Ji Peng’s four limbs were broken by Lu Ming. He lay on the ground like a dead dog.

“Get lost!”

Lu Ming kicked Ji Peng and a few of his subordinates a few times, sending them flying out of the courtyard.

After all, this was the youluo devil Kingdom and the eldest princess’s residence. He couldn’t kill Ji Peng. If he did, he could only run away.

This was not Lu Ming’s goal. He still needed the eldest Princess to introduce him to the royal family of the eternal demon nation.

“Kid, just you wait!”

Ji Peng’s sinister voice came from outside the courtyard.

He had said that he would break Lu Ming’s limbs and throw him out. In the end, his limbs were broken and he was thrown out like a dead dog. This made him furious.

Lu Ming frowned. If the other party went too far, he would not mind killing him and leaving the youluo demonic kingdom. He would think of other ways.

The next morning, a group of people arrived at the eldest princess’s Manor and met with her directly.

Ji Peng was in the crowd!

However, Ji Peng wasn’t the leader of this group of people. His big brother, one of his uncles, had personally led his men here.

“General Ji, brother Ji, please sit!”

In a large hall, the eldest Princess received Ji Peng and the others. However, her gaze was only fixed on the middle-aged man in the lead and a young man with a cold expression.

This middle-aged man was Ji Peng’s uncle. He was the younger brother of the youluo devil Kingdom’s Grand Marshal and also a devil general of the youluo devil Kingdom.

The young man was Ji Peng’s elder brother, a top genius of the youluo demonic kingdom with a terrifying King body.

“Eldest Princess, we came here to ask for a person from you!”

Uncle Ji Peng said.

“You want to be alone? Who is it?”

The eldest Princess was slightly taken aback and frowned.

If the Ji family wanted someone, why did they have to come to her?
